= Introduction =

a) Download a Lesson from the SVN Trunk.

b) Download either the debug or release version of PhysXCPP.dll from the respective debug/release folders.

c) When compiling the lesson in Visual Studio, the PhysXCPP.dll will be missing in two locations, replace with the DLL you just downloaded in b).

d) It should run...

Leave an issue on the issues area if you're having issues, it's early days.
